name: Indy Scala
body:
### About

A group of people who get together to talk about Scala, learn Scala,
and enjoy the camaraderie of other Scala enthusiasts.

This group is open to anyone who wishes to join. We've got a diverse
group with many different programming languages represented.


### Meetings
* 2013-01 - Macros and [String Interpolation](https://github.com/bfritz/indyscala-string-interpolation)
* 2012-12 - [Dropwizard](https://github.com/bfritz/indyscala-dropwizard) and [Clojure](https://github.com/mattdeboard/clj-intro)
